com.facebook.litho.widget

Interface LayoutHandlerFactory


  • public interface LayoutHandlerFactory
    A Factory used to create LithoHandlers in RecyclerBinder.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LithoHandler createLayoutCalculationHandler(RenderInfo renderInfo) 
      boolean shouldUpdateLayoutHandler(RenderInfo previousRenderInfo, RenderInfo newRenderInfo) 

    • Method Detail

      • createLayoutCalculationHandler

        LithoHandler createLayoutCalculationHandler(RenderInfo renderInfo)
        Returns:
        a new LithoHandler that will be used to compute the layouts of the children of the RecyclerSpec.

      • shouldUpdateLayoutHandler

        boolean shouldUpdateLayoutHandler(RenderInfo previousRenderInfo,
                                  RenderInfo newRenderInfo)
        Returns:
        If true, LithoHandler of ComponentTree that's being updated by update operation of RecyclerBinder will be replaced by new LithoHandler returned from createLayoutCalculationHandler(RenderInfo), otherwise keep using existing LithoHandler created during item insertion.
